segments.text: I'm focusing on the adult woman in the center of the right side of the frame.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She stands there in her dress and apron, an image of domestic routine.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She holds a plate, meticulously drying it with a dish towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her expression is utterly neutral, completely unaware of the developing disaster around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see her foot already in the puddle, but she doesn't flinch, doesn't react at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's truly astonishing how absorbed she is in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a strange sense of frustration, almost anger, watching her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why isn't she paying attention to her surroundings?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of her slipping on that wet floor makes me feel a little sad for her eventual surprise.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: All those clean dishes are stacked nearby, waiting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is a perfect storm of obliviousness and impending accidents.
segments.speaker: PAR
